title: Hour 1: Chief Concerns
description:
In this episode, Stephen A. and Michael Irvin debate whether there's extra pressure on Derek Carr heading into the season after news came out that Tom Brady was almost a Raider in 2020. Plus, how concerned should we be about Kansas City's offense with the loss of Tyreek Hill? Stephen A. and The Playmaker disagree on this one... We're halfway through Stephen A.'s Top 10 NFL storylines with #5 today: What are the biggest keys for Dallas to be successful this season? You know Michael Irvin has something about them Cowboys. And, Stephen A. and Irvin debate where the Bucs rank among NFC teams.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Stephen A. Smith, Molly Qerim Rose
itunes:subtitle: First Take Hour 1: Will the Chiefs offense take a step back without Tyreek Hill?
